languages.text: "Наивное дитя, ты для мон-кай такое же чудовище, что и прочие твоего вида. Если бы не третье око, что зрит Ша'эиль, нить твоей судьбы оборвалась бы еще при рождении".
"Naive child. You are a monster to your own kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."
languages.original_text: "Наивное дитя, ты для мон-кай такое же чудовище, что и прочие твоего вида. Если бы не третье око, что зрит Ша'эиль, нить твоей судьбы оборвалась бы еще при рождении".

traits.locale_text: "Naive child, you are as much a monster to the mon-keigh as the rest of your kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naive child, you are as much a monster to the mon-keigh as the rest of your kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naive child, you are as much a monster to the mon-keigh as the rest of your kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naive child, you are as much a monster to the mon-keigh as the rest of your kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “天真的孩子，你在你族人的眼里就是怪物。若不是因为你的第三只眼可以看见纱芮尔，你的命运之线早在你诞生的那一刻就会被斩断。”
languages.original_text: "Naive child. You are a monster to your own kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."

traits.locale_text: “天真的孩子，对于猴子来说，你和你的族人同样也是怪物。若不是因为你的第三只眼可以看见纱芮尔，你的命运之线将在你出生的那一刻被斩断。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ma pauvre enfant... Vous êtes un monstre aux yeux mêmes de vos semblables. Sans votre troisième œil qui vous permet de voir le Sha'eil, le fil de votre destin aurait été coupé dès votre naissance. »
languages.original_text: "Naive child. You are a monster to your own kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."

traits.locale_text: « Ma pauvre enfant... Pour les mon-keigh, vous êtes autant un monstre que le reste de vos semblables. Sans votre troisième œil qui vous permet de voir le Sha'eil, le fil de votre destin aurait été coupé dès votre naissance. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Naives Kind. Ihr seid ein Monster gegen Euresgleichen. Hättet Ihr kein drittes Auge, das Sha'eil sieht, wäre Euer Schicksalsfaden schon bei Eurer Geburt durchtrennt worden."
languages.original_text: "Naive child. You are a monster to your own kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."

traits.locale_text: "Naives Kind, Ihr seid für die Chem-Pan-Sey ebenso sehr ein Monster wie der Rest Eurer Spezies. Hättet Ihr kein drittes Auge, das Sha'eil sieht, wäre Euer Schicksalsfaden schon bei Eurer Geburt durchtrennt worden."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「世間知らずの子ね。お前も自分の種族にとってモンスターなの。シャーエイルを見る第三の目がなければ、運命の糸は生まれた時に断ち切られたでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "Naive child. You are a monster to your own kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."

traits.locale_text: 「世間知らずの子ね、モン＝ケイにとってはお前も他の種族と同じようにモンスターなの。シャーエイルを見る第三の目がなければ、運命の糸は生まれた時に断ち切られたでしょうね」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Niña ingenua, tu propio pueblo te considera un monstruo. Si no fuera porque vuestro tercer ojo ve el Sha'eil, el hilo de vuestras vidas se cortaría al nacer».
languages.original_text: "Naive child. You are a monster to your own kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."

traits.locale_text: «Niña ingenua, los otros mon-keigh te consideran tan monstruosa como al resto de los tuyos. Si no fuera porque vuestro tercer ojo ve el Sha'eil, el hilo de vuestras vidas se cortaría al nacer».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Naive child. You are a monster to your own kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."

languages.text: "Ah saf çocuk ah. Kendi türünün gözünde canavardan farksızsın. Sha'eil'i gören üçüncü gözün olmasa kaderin daha doğumunda kesilecekti, haberin yok."
languages.original_text: "Naive child. You are a monster to your own kind. Were it not for your third eye that sees Sha'eil, the thread of your fate would have been severed at birth."

traits.locale_text: "Ah saf çocuk ah. Kendi türünün gözünde canavardan farksızsın. Sha'eil'i gören üçüncü gözün olmasa kaderin daha doğumunda kesilecekti, haberin yok."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
